question: How would you choose a new watch?

What you do.question: In any battle the side that wins is

The Egg.description: The ultimate enabler- alone you do nothing, but without you nothing else would have meaning.

The Chicken.description: When not engineering, I have no doubt you make a living guessing the number of jelly beans in a jar.

Brazil.description: If you're not the rock, you're the hard place. Where other people give solutions, all you give is problems. But let's be fair- without you and your boundaries the whole project would just spiral out of control.

2001: A Space Oddessy.description: You are the ultimate original thinker; everything else is just a devivation of your ideas.

Scott Pilgrim.description: Quis definit ipsos definition? You do; You've gone beyond self-referential to meta.

The F1 Driver.description: For you the whole really is the sum of it's parts- there's no such thing as a structure, just a collection of beams and slabs.

The F1 Engineering Team.description: A champion of the under represented, you know that it's the hidden pieces of an organisation that keep it all together.

The ghost house.question: What makes a good car great?

Bumper stickers.description: Just how many bangles are you wearing anyway? For you, a structure is just something you can accessorize!

Leather upholstery.description: Master of feng shue- the way you arrange and group aspects gives new meaning to the world around you.

The sub-woofer in the boot.description: Like Q from James Bond, your aim in life is to gadetise the world until your house looks like it was built for Wallace and Grommit.

Queen – Bohemian Raphasody.description: Like the many adonis' that lounge about the beaches of California- you're content just go with the flow.

Bonnie Tyler - Holding Out For A Hero.description: For you, life is about power, no doubt you spend your days power-walking in your power-suit, before comming home, striking a power-pose and bellowing a power-ballad.

Earth, Wind & Fire – September.description: Never too hot, never too cold- you spend the whole of your life making sure that other's are comfortable.

Billy Joel – We Didn't Start The Fire.description: You like the make a splash, but behind your 'fun' exteriour is a cool, calculating, mind.

The way that you do it.question: Which book is most important to society?

7 Highly Effective Habbits Of Highly Eff.question: Why do the government always get things wrong?

Like minded people can synergise the fut.description: An inspiration to the Vorgons- you are the pinacle of Bureaucracy; all red tape with no information.

Good ideas go to die..description: Let's face it, when people say 'somebody really ought to sought this out'- that somebody is you.

They don't use the right processes..question: If a tree falls in a forest, does it make a sound?

Yes.description: The ultimate catalyst; you change everything you come into contact with, but remain unchanged yourself.

No.description: Like every Prom King or Queen- approval is everything to you. You spend your life judging others and defining yourself on how others judge you.

Only if I told it to..description: Some might say you're a control freak; but how else will you become successful if you don't micro-manage every aspect of your life?

Catcher in the Rye.question: To you, the British Museum is...

A treasure trove of historically signifi.question: Things would be better if we...

Stopped talking about it and actually di.description: A number cruncher at heart, you'd rather corrolate the relationship between pigment density and watch-duration than appreicate the art.

Asked everyone else what they think.description: You are, quite literally, outside of the box. Forever reaching beyond the project to find new sources of information.

Went back to the good old days.description: You are living in the past; obsessed with recording and re-living what was, without giving a thought to what might happen.

All did exactly what I say!.description: You're self-obsessed, there's no getting around it. All you ever want to do is tell people about yourself.

An apparently free place to spend a day.question: Should I wake you up, before I go go?

Sure- I don't want to miss it when you h.description: You live for the forth dimension; unwilling to let even a second go past without something to mark it.

Nah- Clubs today are too loud and expens.description: Like the best accountant, you know the cost of everything, the value of nothing, and the best country to setup a off-shore tax-avoidance scheme.

If you tilt you head in a certain way it.question: After stealing KITT from Knightrider you would...

Maintains a constant diameter.description: Some people might call you a small-picture thinker; but someone's got to care about all those little bits that make up the whole.

Gathers no additional biomass.description: The ultimate inner beauty champion; for you, it really is what someone is made of that counts.

Or you don't..description: For you it's all about the look of a thing. Like the Mona Lisa, you recall every single vestige of the subject, except what it really is.

Or you can pay someone to give it to you.description: The ultimate trendsetter- It's not whether you win or loose, but how you looked while you were doing it.

A magical world of reasonably priced sto.description: Like Kevin McCloud, you believe that paintwork is structural; and a building is just a place to mount beautiful doors and windows.

A circle of hell where new home-owners g.description: You call a spade a spade and have nout to do with all that 'la-de-da' abstractionalism- if you can't touch it, it ain't worth worrying about.

That one where they patrionise people wh.question: The best holiday is one where you...

Drag everyone up at five in morning to f.description: You are Godzilla! Ploughing straight through structures, exposing internal planes and revealing the hidden details.

Wyle away the time in small cafes and ba.description: Politics (or revloution) beckons- you seek out and become the the voice of the unrepresented masses.

Climb every mountain (and ford every str.description: Like Scotland, there isn't a flat square inch on you, just continuous curvatures, undulations and peaks.

Re-runs of the Krypton Factor.question: Do you download Game of Thrones?

No! Stealing is wrong (shh- the NSA are.description: You're the sort of person who uses a square-rule to tidy their desk; every executive toy aligned, every folder seated perfectly in the neatest of rows.

Yes! But they'll still get my money when.description: Like a Vienetta, you split the world into layers and light-up the lives of others.

I'm too smug to own a television and hav.description: You are the 1000 words that make up a picture; forever bemoaning that the film wasn't as good as the book.
